root.name: Rock Band Track Pack Volume 2
root.description: The disc includes songs importable to the Rock Band series of games, and also allows them to be played stand-alone without the use of a Rock Band game. They are all master recordings of songs, and are arranged in different stages, dependant on difficulty of song.SetlistAngels Airwaves – “It Hurts”Avenged Sevenfold – “Afterlife”Blondie – “Call Me”The Cars – “Just What I Needed”Devo – “Girl U Want”Disturbed – “Indestructible”Duran Duran – “Rio”Fall Out Boy – “This Ain’t a Scene…”Garbage – “Why Do You Love Me”Judas Priest – “You Got Another Thing Comin’”Lynyrd Skynyrd – “Simple Man”Maximo Park – “Girls Who Play Guitars"Motley Crue – “Saints of Los Angeles”Nine Inch Nails – “The Perfect Drug”Papa Roach – “Time is Running Out”Pixies – “Monkey Gone to Heaven”The Police – “Message in a Bottle”Red Hot Chili Peppers – “Snow (Hey Oh)”Smashing Pumpkins – “Zero”Weezer – “El Scorcho"

similar_games.game: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
